sub_fields.label: API Project name
sub_fields.name: yt_api_project_name
sub_fields.instructions: Project name within google console you wish to use.

sub_fields.label: API Key
sub_fields.name: yt_api_key
sub_fields.instructions: This is the API key used for access.

sub_fields.label: Substitution Word
sub_fields.name: yt_search_substitutions_word
sub_fields.instructions: Word to use in double square brackets. [[word]]

sub_fields.label: Replace with
sub_fields.name: yt_search_substitutions_replace
sub_fields.instructions: What to replace the word with.

fields.label: Filter Instance
fields.name: yt_filter_instance
fields.instructions: A filter instance is a group of filters, all performed one after another. Each filter instance is set in the scrape and applied to the YouTube result.

fields.label: Filter Catalog
fields.name: yt_filter_catalog
fields.instructions: Lists all of the filters available.

fields.label: Transform Group Instance
fields.name: yt_transform_instance
fields.instructions: These are groups of individual transform commands. Build up the commands into a group and use that group in your mapping.

fields.label: Transform Catalog
fields.name: yt_transform_catalog
fields.instructions: Lists all of the transforms available.
